thread.title: Nasdaq jumps 2.27%, closes above 5,000 on tech earnings
thread.title_full: Nasdaq jumps 2.27%, closes above 5,000 on tech earnings

title: Nasdaq jumps 2.27%, closes above 5,000 on tech earnings
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Oct 23, 2015, 21:28 BST - UK Markets closed Nasdaq jumps 2.27%, closes above 5,000 on tech earnings AFP – 11 minutes ago View Photo 

US stocks rose sharply Friday following strong earnings from Microsoft (NasdaqGS: MSFT - news ) , Google parent Alphabet (Xetra: ABEA.DE - news ) and Amazon that pushed the Nasdaq (NasdaqGS: NDAQ - news ) above 5,000 for the first time in two months. 
At the closing bell, the tech-rich Nasdaq Composite Index stood at 5,031.86, up 111.81 points (2.27 percent). 
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 157.81 (0.90 percent) to 17,646.97, while the S&P 500 gained 22.65 (1.10 percent) to 2,075.15.
